name: Meowk and Frocco
description:
A galaxy far, far away. Here the Milky Way is real milk, here you can find dangerous, abandoned space stations, which are left behind by ancient civilizations, are spread out all over the space. In this horrible place live the best Friends ever Meowk and Froggo. But, one day Froggo mysteriously disappeared. You have to find your best friend whatever it takes. Unfortunately your rocket had crashed. Yet full of dangerous traps chambers are have to be passed. You're completely weightless. Only jet pack can help you get through. You are going on an adventure!

Gameplay:
Meowk and Froggo - an action game that will test your reaction and teach you to adjust to timings, 14 levels of traps, dangers and weightlessness await you, control only the speed of rotation and your rocket pack.
